text: Allah ta’ala hawaaye chalaata hai, wo abr ko uthaati hai, phir Allah ta’ala apni mansha ke mutaabiq ose asmaan mein phaila deta hai aur us ke tukde tukde gira deta hai, phir aap dekhte hai ke us ke andar se qatre nikalte hai aur jinhe Allah chaahta hai, un bandho par wo paani barsaata hai, to wo khush khush ho jaate hai
